alert.note: Alert for Brunswick; Nottoway (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 16 at 4:18PM EDT until June 16 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN NOTTOWAY...CENTRAL DINWIDDIE AND NORTHERN BRUNSWICK COUNTIES... At 417 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near McKenney, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... McKenney around 430 PM EDT. Dewitt around 435 PM EDT. Dinwiddie around 440 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Rawlings, Barrows Store, Warfield, Wharfs Store, Darvills, Ordsburg, Center Star, Five Forks, Callaville and Cherry Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
